Verifies that cancelling property value editing doesn't affect undo stack.

Text

Running: selectNode

Running: addNewProperty

Running: editProperty

element.style { ()

[expanded]

    color: blue;
    : ;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
